name: Working Class Weyland Demo
description: A colourful platformer with an emphasis on smooth movement and punishing difficulty, wanted to have this undercurrent of horror there too and have an additional post-game mode where you then explored the buried horror elements of the world, but you know that's some serious scope creep and gave up after becoming overwhelmed by the project. But hey here's 6 pretty fun levels and a boss so why not try it out?
